attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ghurkhas have served the armed services of this country with pride and bravery for many years. The way in which they are currently being treated in relation to settling in the UK is shameful, these are an exceptional group of people who should be valued and welcomed into the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
